name: ipinfo
title: IPInfo
description: An extension to use ipinfo.io's API to get information about IP addresses
author: narghev

commands.name: my-ip
commands.title: My IP
commands.subtitle: Get information about your IP address
commands.description: Get information about your IP address using ipinfo.io's API

commands.name: ip-info
commands.title: Ip Info
commands.subtitle: Get information about an IP address
commands.description: Get information about an IP address using ipinfo.io's API

commands.name: history
commands.title: IP Info History
commands.subtitle: Get the history of your IP address lookups
commands.description: Manage the local history of your IP address lookups

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
